```{r, echo = TRUE, eval = FALSE}
rubbish <- function(x, y, z){
  #comment without space
  a_long_func_call(argument1,
                   c(NA,1,1,1),
                   ...)
                   g(a)%>% b
  new_x <-      y(sqrt(a_long_func_call))
  if (x + new_x >3) 
    {
     1+11 ++(
        3/3--3
        )
  }
}
```
